scripts.test:lp1: rm -rf allure-results && npx playwright test tests/LoginPage1.spec.ts
scripts.test:dashboard: rm -rf allure-results && npx playwright test tests/Dashboard.spec.ts
scripts.test:getreport: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.test:contractdetails: rm -rf allure-results && npx playwright test tests/ContractDetails.spec.ts
scripts.test:cal: rm -rf allure-results && npx playwright test tests/cal.spec.ts
scripts.test:profile: rm -rf allure-results && npx playwright test tests/Profile.spec.ts
scripts.test:support: rm -rf allure-results && npx playwright test tests/Support.spec.ts
scripts.test:faq: rm -rf allure-results && npx playwright test tests/FAQ.spec.ts
scripts.test:callback: rm -rf allure-results && npx playwright test tests/Callback.spec.ts
